          <title>
            <string language="fr">Un observatoire</string>
            <string language="en">An observatory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Sternwarte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um obervatório</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un osservatorio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα παρατηρητήριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un observatorio</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ces illustrations montrent un observatoire qui est habituellement installé sur le sommet des montagnes pour se débarasser des lumières de ville, de la pollution et de quelques nuages.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustrations shows an observatory that is usually installed on top of mountains to get rid of city lights, pollution and some clouds.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">les astronomes</string>
            <string language="en">astronomers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumières de la ville</string>
            <string language="en">city lights</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">des nuages</string>
            <string language="en">clouds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">montagne</string>
            <string language="en">mountain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">observatoire</string>
            <string language="en">observatory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">planète</string>
            <string language="en">Planet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pollution</string>
            <string language="en">Pollution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile</string>
            <string language="en">star</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">télescope</string>
            <string language="en">telescope</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses zeigt Abbildungen eine Sternwarte, die 
normalerweise auf Berge installiert wird, um Stadtlichter, 
Verunreinigung und einige Wolken loszuwerden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este as ilustrações mostram um obervatório que
seja instalado geralmente no alto das montanhas para começar livrado 
de luzes da cidade, de poluição e de algumas nuvens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo le illustrazioni mostra un osservatorio 
che è installato solitamente in cima alle montagne per eliminare le 
luci della città, l'inquinamento ed alcune nubi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν ένα παρατηρητήριο 
που εγκαθίσταται συνήθως πάνω από τα βουνά για να ξεφορτωθεί τα 
φώτα πόλεων, τη ρύπανση και μερικά σύννεφα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este las ilustraciones muestran un observatorio 
que esté instalado generalmente encima de las montañas para 
conseguir librado de luces de la ciudad, de la contaminación y de 
algunas nubes.</string>
          </description>
